biography:
Elena Bagutta, discovered by Gonzalo Suárez and Pedro Almodóvar, is an accomplished film and television actor. She has worked across genres with credits such as Mary in Suárez's drama "Mi nombre es Sombra" and Lucía in "Raquel busca su sitio", a television sitcom.

Elena is fluent in English, Italian and Spanish.
name: Elena Bagutta
